short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight Chrome extension that delivers daily English learning content in small, digestible portions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎯 Daily Byte English

A Chrome extension that helps you learn English effectively by turning your daily browsing into a learning experience.

✨ Features

🔍 Daily English words with different difficulty levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
📚 Personal vocabulary system with progress tracking and achievement badges
🎯 Word of the day with pronunciation, definition, and example sentences
🌐 Premium features including:
Unlimited word saving
Additional example sentences
Detailed grammar tips
Word pronunciation audio
Priority support
🔔 Daily notifications to help you stay consistent
🎨 Clean, modern interface with dark mode support
🚀 Installation

💡 Tips
Use the extension while reading news, articles, or any English content
Review your saved words regularly to track your progress
Enable notifications to get daily word reminders
Unlock premium features for a more comprehensive learning experience

📝 Feedback
Your feedback helps make Daily Byte English better! If you encounter any issues or have suggestions.

Made with ❤️ for English learners worldwide
